mapper.insert: insert into projet.Utilisateur(cip, Nom, Prenom, Courriel,role) values (#{person.cip}, #{person.lastName}, #{person.firstName}, #{person.email}, #{person.role}) on conflict (cip) do nothing;
mapper.select: select cip, Nom, Prenom, Courriel, Programme, promotion from projet.Utilisateur where (cip) = (coalesce(#{cip}, cip))
